name: MaytagSmartAppliances
0:
”Alexa, tell Maytag to start the washing machine.”
”Alexa, tell Maytag to pause the dryer.”
”Alexa, ask Maytag for time remaining on the dryer.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: maytag
des:
The Maytag Smart Appliances skill lets you use Amazon Alexa and Echo devices to control and monitor your Maytag® smart capable washer and dryer*. You can use Alexa to manage laundry from anywhere so no load is left behind. Control your laundry room no matter what you’ve got on your hands - Just ask Alexa!

In order for this to work, you must already have installed and opened the Maytag™ mobile app, created and signed into a Maytag app account, and added your Maytag smart capable devices using the Maytag app.*

Maytag Smart Appliances for Alexa works with select Wi-Fi enabled Maytag devices including select Maytag smart capable Washers and Dryers. See complete list of supported models at:
https://www.maytag.com/connected-appliances.html

For more details on how to get started, see Control Smart Home Devices using Alexa (...).

*US only. WiFi & App Required. Connected Subscription May Be Required. Features subject to change. Details and privacy info at maytag.com/connect. Appliance must be set to remote enable.
